citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
3:30 pm on 02/17/2016.
The license holder was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility. She indicated that she was away and would
not be returning for a couple of hours.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by standard mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
3:30 pm on 02/17/2016.
The license holder was contacted by phone after arriving at the facility.  She indicated that she was away and would
not be returning for a couple of hours.
A responsible person shall be available to conduct an inspection during business hours.
Note: This inspection report was sent by standard mail.
